testBulletsEnemy() - Method in class com.drfl.twinstickshooter.tests.Tests
Spawns enemy and tests if player hitting it with a bullet results in enemy losing health.
testEnemyAutoShootPlayer() - Method in class com.drfl.twinstickshooter.tests.Tests
Spawns enemy and tests shooting by allowing the enemy to hit the player and checking that player health drops.
testEnemyMovement() - Method in class com.drfl.twinstickshooter.tests.Tests
Spawns enemy and tests that enemy changes position over time.
testMovement() - Method in class com.drfl.twinstickshooter.tests.Tests
Tests 8-directional movement of the main character by checking whether the character moved as expected.
Tests - Class in com.drfl.twinstickshooter.tests
Unit tests for the Model/Controller packages

testScore() - Method in class com.drfl.twinstickshooter.tests.Tests
Spawns enemy and tests that score goes up if enemy's health drops to 0 or less.

TSSGameOver - Class in com.drfl.twinstickshooter.view
Game over screen, displays for a set amount of time and changes to highscore or main menu screen depending on whether the player achieved an high score.

Main menu screen, options for starting game, seeing highscores, controlling volume, choosing input method and exiting game.

MVC Model, handles the underlying data that supports both the Controller and View packages.

TSSScoreboard.ScoreFunction - Interface in com.drfl.twinstickshooter.view
